alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 12:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Bernard, southeastern St. Charles, east central Lafourche, Jefferson and Plaquemines Parishes through 115 PM CDT... At 1215 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Sulphur, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cut Off, Galliano, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Port Sulphur, Larose, Gretna, Westwego, Golden Meadow, Jean Lafitte, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Poydras, Myrtle Grove, Pointe A La Hache, Estelle and Woodmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
